source.interface:
<implements name="DecompositionInterface" />
*
* Finds the decomposition of a matrix in the form of:
*
* A = O*T*OT
*
* where A is a symmetric m by m matrix, O is an orthogonal matrix, and T is a tridiagonal matrix. * Peter Abeles
* Extracts the tridiagonal matrix found in the decomposition. T If not null then the results will be stored here. Otherwise a new matrix will be created. The extracted T matrix.
* An orthogonal matrix that has the following property: T = QTAQ Q If not null then the results will be stored here. Otherwise a new matrix will be created. The extracted Q matrix.
* Extracts the diagonal and off diagonal elements of the decomposed tridiagonal matrix. * Since it is symmetric only one off diagonal array is returned. diag Diagonal elements. Modified. off off diagonal elements. Modified.
